tag: {display:{Name:'{"translate":"ms.skill.004","fallback":"铤而走险","italic":false,"color":"#5599FF"}',Lore:['[{"text":"⏲ 60s  ▶ 12s","italic":false,"color":"#7367F0"}]','{"translate":"ms.skill.004.desc.a","fallback":"若守卫者距你较近，则","italic":false,"color":"#5599FF"}','{"translate":"ms.skill.004.desc.b","fallback":" + 移速 +100% 且使守卫者移速 -90%","italic":false,"color":"green"}','{"translate":"ms.skill.004.desc.c","fallback":" - 或自身移速 -60%","italic":false,"color":"red"}','{"translate":"ms.skill.004.desc.d","fallback":"若守卫者距你较远，则","italic":false,"color":"#5599FF"}','{"translate":"ms.skill.004.desc.e","fallback":" + 高亮最近的守卫者","italic":false,"color":"green"}','{"translate":"ms.skill.004.desc.f","fallback":" - 或传送至最近的守卫者处并移速 -100%","italic":false,"color":"red"}','{"translate":"ms.skill.004.desc.g","fallback":"触发反面效果的概率初始为 5%，但每次触发","italic":false,"color":"white"}','{"translate":"ms.skill.004.desc.h","fallback":"技能 +7% 失败概率，至多提升至 40%","italic":false,"color":"white"}']},HideFlags:63,CustomModelData:71004}
